name: Starship Plugin
description: Install and configure Starship prompt in your development container.

defaultConfig.description: Whether to use my default Starship configuration.

configFile.description: Path to a custom Starship configuration file. If set, this will override `defaultConfig`.

localConfig.description: Whether to use a local Starship configuration file. This is not supported in feature installation, use mounts + postCreateCommand in devcontainer.json to copy local configs.

nerdFont.description: The Nerd Font to install for proper Starship prompt rendering.
